name: Pizza City
description:
"In 2021 they voted my city the best place to live in the world. Main advantages? Sky high rate of delicious pizza and more people living from the pizza business than anywhere else. Can’t deny it - it’s all true... That's why everybody wants to live here. This city’s always got a promise for you. Might be good cheese, good peperoni...  It’s there, just around the corner… And it keeps you going. It’s a city of dreams. And I’m a big dreamer…" - Johnny Pizzahand.

Welcome to Pizza City. You have the most important job in town. No, you're not the Pizza Mayor or anything like that... You're the pizza delivery person!

Your job is to deliver huge piles of pizza as fast as possible. Drive your motorcycle using the keyboard and mantain the balance of the pile of pizza boxes using your mouse! But watch out! The tower of pizzas will keep growing until you've delivered them, so don't take too long!

We are a small team of developers who love to make games in their free time. This game was made  in  48h for the ZJam '21. The theme for the jam was "city". We're super proud of the final result and we hope you like it! Follow us on Twitter if you want to receive news about our bigger projects!

Things we added after the game jam ended: training scenes, progressive money system and bug fixes.

You can find us here!
